fields.name: Tea Tree Oil
fields.description: “Tea Tree” or Melaleuca Essential Oil, is best known for its purifying qualities, which make it useful for cleansing the skin, home surfaces, and purifying the air.

fields.name: Lavender Oil
fields.description: Lavender essential oil is often considered a must-have oil due to its versatile uses. Its calming and relaxing aroma promotes a peaceful environment conducive to sleep and it can ease feelings of tension when used internally.

fields.name: Lemon Oil
fields.description: Lemon oil has cleansing, purifying, and invigorating properties for an uplifting, positive boost throughout the day. Shop our best-selling Lemon oil.

fields.name: Rosemary Oil
fields.description: While it is frequently used for cooking, Rosemary has long been revered by many cultures for its internal benefits and energizing scent.

fields.name: Citronella Oil
fields.description: Citronella is a tall grass grown in Asia with a crisp, fresh aroma. It is soothing to the skin and creates an uplifting atmosphere. Citronella essential oil is a known powerful insect repellent and an ideal companion during outdoor activities.

fields.name: Eucalyptus Oil
fields.image_url: Eucalyptus also has cleansing properties. Use aromatically or topically to promote feelings of clear breathing and open airways. Eucalyptus also adds to a soothing massage.

fields.name: Frankincense Oil
fields.description: Considered the The king of oils, Frankincense has extraordinary health benefits when used topically or taken internally.

fields.name: Lemongrass Oil
fields.description: A favorite oil for massages, Lemongrass oil provides a pungent, smoky aroma, and offers purifying and toning benefits for the skin.

fields.name: Patchouli Oil
fields.image_url: A member of the mint family, Patchouli oil is known to help with skin imperfections and for its grounding, earthy aroma.

fields.name: Peppermint Oil
fields.description: Peppermint oil also helps alleviate occasional stomach upset and promotes healthy respiratory function when taken internally.

fields.name: Sweet Almond Oil
fields.description: Sweet Almond Oil is a rich, nourishing base to which other essential oils are added for use in body massage. It is both colourless and odourless and may offer relief for dry and itchy skin. It is easily absorbed by the skin and offers nourishment and soothing care. Sweet almond can also be used in aromatic baths, for inhalation and as body massage oil.

fields.name: Light Coconut Oil
fields.description: Light Coconut Oil is made from pure oil extracted from the coconut, cocos nucifera and deodourised. This product is an amazing pure body moisturiser, its cooling and moisturising properties work to protect the skin and retain moisture. It is particularly useful after exposure to the sun to help nourish the skin.

fields.name: Rose Oil In Almond Oil
fields.description: Rose Oil, 0.4% in sweet Almond Oil is an all round balancing oil ideal as a general aromatherapy massage oil because of its richness and nourishing qualities. You can add this product to essential oils to make a beautiful massage oil, which works particularly well on mature skin as it is very rich and contains many moisturising properties.

fields.name: Jojoba Oil
fields.description: ojoba is a liquid wax, smooth and moisturising and naturally rich in antioxidants and fatty acids. When applied in massage, Jojoba will soften and condition the skin, leaving it with a silky finish. Jojoba is highly compatible with the skin's own natural oils and therefore beautifully absorbent.

fields.name: Arnica Oil
fields.description: Arnica Oil is a pure oil extracted from the flowers of arnica montana in helianthus annus oil, used for its pain-relieving and health promoting properties. This product is particularly useful for exercise related injuries such as sprains or bruises.. It is not recommended for aromatherapy as it is very potent and could be toxic.

fields.name: Frankincense Massage & Body Oil
fields.description: A deeply relaxing and meditative massage oil, Atlantic Aromatics massage oils are blended in small batches to ensure freshness, using the finest quality essential oils and cold pressed unrefined sweet almond oil. They are free from alcohol and preservatives and are not tested on animals

fields.name: Neroli Massage Oil
fields.description: Neroli Massage Blend is a multi-purpose natural oil blend. The aromas of Neroli and Mandarin may help to uplift mood and help one to relax during periods of anxiety. It is also incredible at reducing the appearance of stretch marks. It can be used during pregnancy to prevent stretch marks from ever appearing.

fields.name: Baby Massage Oil
fields.description: Baby Massage Oil is a gentle and soothing blend of organic essential oils including Lavender and Chamomile. Massaging this blend into your babies skin can help keep them feel relaxed and calm. The gentle, calming aromas of the oils add to the relaxing feel of the massage.

fields.name: Elephant Oil Burner
fields.description: A white elephant oil burner with a two tone cream and brown effect. Perfect for burning oil or wax melts. This white elephant wax burner makes a wonderful gift for anyone

fields.name: Multicoloured Oil Burner
fields.description: Multicoloured Oil Burner, ceramic and glossy. Bring colour into your life with this stylish burner

fields.name: Open Hands Burner
fields.description: Stylish Minimalist Oil Burner in the shape of an open hand, simple but effective. Comes in a blue colour

fields.name: Oriental Oil Burner
fields.description: Hot Brown Porcelain Burner which is oriental in design, which will create a joyful ambience. Has a Zen Symbol Motive

fields.name: Teapot Oil Burner
fields.description: Charming oil warmer is a little teapot atop a country stove made from beautiful blue porcelain.

fields.name: White Ceramic Oil Burner
fields.description: This white ceramic oil burner features a cutout heart and 'home' text in a cute, contemporary design. Brilliant to capture the home vibe

fields.name: Metal Oil Burner
fields.description: Small ceramic essential oil burner, in navy colour, suitable for diffusing essential oil, it resonates with the element Metal

fields.name: White Ceramic Beehive Oil Burner
fields.description: This ceramic oil burner comes in the shape of a white beehive with a sweet little bee on the lid. A truly original design which is quirky yet elegant and the perfect accessory to help you relax.
